thread.title: Israel vilified at U.N. body over Gaza killings

title: Israel vilified at U.N. body over Gaza killings
text:
Israel vilified at U.N. body over Gaza killings 1:58pm EDT - 01:25
The U.N.'s Human Rights Council has adopted a resolution condemning Israel's killing of at least 60 Palestinians during the opening of the new American embassy in Jerusalem, but Israel and the U.S. view the body as heavily biased. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The U.N.'s Human Rights Council has adopted a resolution condemning Israel's killing of at least 60 Palestinians during the opening of the new American embassy in Jerusalem, but Israel and the U.S. view the body as heavily biased.
